field.name: item_with_text.font
field.description: The font to use to display the text.

field.name: item_with_text.text_inside
field.description: Tell if the text is displayed only inside the bounds of the item.

field.name: item_with_text.stretched_text
field.description: Tell if the text is stretched to match the bounds of the item.

field.name: item_with_text.scale_to_fit
field.description: Tell if the text is scaled to match the bounds of the item. This option is disabled if stretched_text is true.

field.name: item_with_text.horizontal_align
field.description: How the text is aligned horizontally in the item.

field.name: item_with_text.vertical_align
field.description: How the text is aligned vertically in the item.
